content: from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 2 turn counts as first half_double_crochet now and through out half_double_crochet in the same stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to join the round 16 half_double_crochet total round 3 chain 3 turn half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next st 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 24 half_double_crochet total round 4 chain 3 turn half_double_crochet in the same stitch half_double_crochet in the next 2 sts 2 half_double_crochet in the next stitch around slip_stitch in the beginning chain two to join the round 32 half_double_crochet total round 5 chain 3 turn 2 double_crochet in the same st 3 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch finish off tomato make two with red yarn round 1 chain 2 7hdc in 2nd chain from hook join w/ slip_stitch 8 half_double_crochet round 2 chain 3 turn half_double_crochet in the next st chain 1 around slip_stitch to join round 16 sts round 3 chain 2 turn 2 half_double_crochet around the chain of round 2 half_double_crochet in the next st around join with a slip_stitch to join the round finish off this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no derivative works 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-nd/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa
